Four Kids and It

Ano: 2020

IMDb ID: tt5556054

Classificação: 5.1

Sinopse: Based on a 2012 novel 4 Kids and It which as derived from E. Nesbitt's 1902 novel Five Children and It. This is a tale of a group of children on vacation in Cornwall who find a magical creature, Passamead who can grant wishes and takes them on travels through time and space. The villain in the story is a man whose grandfather tried to capture Passamead in order to exploit the Sand fairy. The children band together to end the villain's nefarious plotting.—leestewarttaylor
